I am a PhD student in [Bioinformatics and Statistical Learning Group](https://tsenglab.biostat.pitt.edu) under the guidance of [Dr. George C. Tseng](http://www.pitt.edu/~ctseng/) and [Dr. Zhao Ren](http://www.pitt.edu/~zren/) at University of Pittsburgh, my research interests include High-dimensional Statistics, Statistical Genetics, Meta-analysis and Subgroup Analysis.

### On-Going Projects
* Optimal detection of weak and sparse signals via adaptive Fisher's method
* Optimal detection of signals under multiple scenarios via p-values combination 
* Fast computation of P-values combination methods via importance sampling and cross entropy (Joint with Wenjia Wang)

### Completed Projects
* Combining p-values for dependent tests with heavy-tailed distributions
* Outcome-guided disease subtyping for high-dimensional omics data (Joint with Peng Liu)
